QuestData.Title: A Convincing Disguise
QuestData.Description: Infiltrating the ranks of Kael's army will not be an easy task. With my knowledge of illusionary magic I could pass you off as one of Kael's followers, but there are certain details in their uniforms I could not replicate.$B$BBring me a set of their robes, a pair of their gloves and a Sunfury guardsman medallion. This will make the results of my magic much more convincing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a set of Sunfury Arcanist Robes, one pair of Sunfury Researcher Gloves and a Sunfury Guardsman Medallion and bring them to Caledis Brightdawn at Manaforge Coruu in Netherstorm.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the outfit pieces I asked of you?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! When I'm through with you, you will be able to slip among the Sunfury ranks unnoticed.
